name: AFK Journey
storyline: In Esperia, a world that looks like a fantasy picture book, you will banish the Miasma with your companions and create your own legends! Your companions are already waiting for you at the tavern.
summary: AFK Journey is a 3D world-based strategy card Gacha RPG. Continuing from AFK Arena, all aspects of its still active predecessor are improved!
